I just tried this patch and I found a bug. If floating windows are hidden and I opened a new floating window then the for_window commands are applied in the focused window. You can reproduce it with this:

1) put this in the config and reload it:
for_window [instance="^urxvt_floating$"] floating enable; border pixel 10
2) run urxvt -name urxvt_floating

the focused window will have border pixel 10.. also, if you unhide the floating windows you will see that the floating window doesn't have border pixel 10.

Author: anonymous
Comment:
for the above bug, looks like this works:
for_window [instance="^urxvt_floating$"] border pixel 10; floating enable

because it chage the border pixel first and then the floating.


another bug:

4) do focus (left|right|up|down)
